resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow BluetoothPlug use the Storage permission
BluetoothPlug requires access to Location and Storage permission. If the permissions are not on, BluetoothPlug cannot be used normally.
After that, BluetoothPlug could search and connect with the BluetoothPlug
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow BluetoothPlug use the Location and Storage permission
